classification: Drawings; Collages / Assemblages; Works on Paper
description: three square graphite drawings and two larger collage pages; a) curving ribbon-like graphite drawing; b) smaller curving string-like graphite drawing; c) graph in pencil of light transmited through 2 sheets of glass; d) cardstock page with two color photos of Red Sea and the brain, blue ink writing below, on verso is first 40000 digits of pi; e) photocopy of a science book illustrating diagrams for curve systems, small photo of blue bubble attached to one corner
dimension:
5 1/2 × 6 in. (14 × 15.2 cm) (image, sheet, 3 drawings: a-c)
12 × 9 in. (30.5 × 22.9 cm) (image, sheet, 2 collages: d-e)
inscription:
c) NATURE\'S GOLDEN NUMBERS / FIBONACCI EXAMPLE / REALITY DEFINES / CURVES DEFINING SIGHT DEFINING PERCEPTION... ; 
d) RULES OF CURVES / PATTERNS / SYSTEMS IN BALANCE / ARE NOT COMPLEX ...
title: Patterns of Thought, Rules of Curves (study)
